channel.title: Suggestion
channel.description: Is there a way to make a script/code for the site or whatever so that you have to read the stickies in a section before you can post in that section. For example if I wanted to post in the question section and I haven't before I would be required to read the sticky(s) before I could post. Maybe even be required to read the sticky(s) before you can even read the other posts, If you chose to do that then you could maybe be redirected to the sticky(s) before you can post/read anything else? I don't know if that is even possible but it doesn't seem like it would be that hard. I think this would cut down on all the spamming and topics that could be answered if people just read the sticky(s) first.
